item.title: INE eJPT: Information Gathering and Enumeration
item.description: Note: Much of the below information is summarized from Alexis Ahmed’s and Josh Mason’s eJPT training videos hosted on INE Penetration Testing Student learning path. Much credit goes to their expertise! Check out their training materials in the sources INE’s Junior Penetration Tester (eJPT) certification is cert designed to be taken by individuals with minimal cybersecurity experience, teaching them everything they need to know about penetration testing in order to get their foot in the door.
